title: The Black Pony
description: A lonely pony, who once was considered a fine game horse, is left behind and finally escapes. But freedom may cost him his life. Annie, an outcast girl who has traveled the country find it difficult to fit in, or simply find a friend. When Annie finds the pony, magic happens. Can she actually hear the thoughts of the dying animal, or is her own loneliness driving her crazy. She must work harder than she ever has in her life and remember every trick of horse care her grandfather taught her if she is to save Midnight, The Black Pony.
author: Connie  Peck
